trans-unit.resname: This password has been leaked in a data breach, it must not be used. Please use another password.
trans-unit.source: This password has been leaked in a data breach, it must not be used. Please use another password.

trans-unit.resname: This value should be between {{ min }} and {{ max }}.

trans-unit.resname: This value should satisfy at least one of the following constraints:
trans-unit.source: This value should satisfy at least one of the following constraints:
trans-unit.target: این مقدار باید حداقل یکی از محدودیت‌های زیر را ارضا کند:

trans-unit.resname: Each element of this collection should satisfy its own set of constraints.
trans-unit.source: Each element of this collection should satisfy its own set of constraints.
trans-unit.target: هر یک از عناصر این مجموعه باید دسته محدودیت‌های خودش را ارضا کند.

trans-unit.resname: This value is not a valid International Securities Identification Number (ISIN).
